EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202302-HHS-HAC-INTERN'L-STROKE-CONF-2023.Follow Up Attendee
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great connecting at International Stroke Conference 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING We hope you enjoyed the conference Image Mature woman in hospital bed
We enjoyed meeting you at ISC and value your contributions to improving stroke treatment. As the pioneer in telestroke, Teladoc Health understands how important it is to enable access to specialists when minutes matter.
Find more information on our website, including how virtual care helped increase access to neurology care—allowing one health system around-the-clock access to specially trained neurologists to provide high-quality stroke care. <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/HHS/hackensack-meridian-case-study/]]>
Learn more about our high-acuity solutions <[[https://teladochealth.com/high-acuity/]]>
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
